room_title: Escape room "The Cure" by Paradox Emporium in Bradley
review: The Cure room was both challenging and fun. I was on a team of 7 people and we escaped with only 5 minutes to spare. 4 stars because I wish the aura in the room was more thematic. Great experience, would go back if and when they open a new room scenario.

room_title: Escape room "The Cure" by Paradox Emporium in Bradley
review: I enjoyed it. We went tonight for my birthday and found the cure, yay!

room_title: Escape room "The Cure" by Paradox Emporium in Bradley
review: The Cure room was great! It was tough, but we made it! Definitely going back for the other room, and for others in the future. Thank you guys!

room_title: Escape room "The Cure" by Paradox Emporium in Bradley
review: Had 12 boys ages 10-12 who tried the escape room for my sons birthday! They had a blast! The guys that were there tonight were amazing with the kids. (Even though it's hard to get all them to focus at the same time lol) A must try!!
